name: Yet Another Random Jumping Game
description:
You may be wondering about the weird name.... You should! well long story, I just felt like making a flash game or a small game what ever you call it, In about 5 hours! and I did it in like 2 or 3, It's just a nice looking game 1 level, But the level is a hard one.... There is this wall that will try to kill you and you got 3 minutes, To get to the end and you can fall and can't see crap! And most of the cubes are cool HDR lighting.... I have no idea what I am doing with my life anymore ._.

But the part why I made this was to make a game in like 5 hours or less, And I did. As a small indie developer (That sucks at coding) I can do one thing good! Copy and past random cubes to make people scream! I don't know if the parkour kinda thing is hard or not, I just think it's fun...

If you want to support me or follow development in other games, Click one of the links here

Patreon

My Google Site where I post everything
